name: balance
description: The (historical) EGLD balance, in atomic units. E.g. '1500000000000000000' means 1.5 EGLD.

name: isSender
description: Whether the account was the sender (of the EGLD) when the balance changed.

name: isSmartContract
description: Whether the account is a smart contract.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp when the address balance was changed.
